headline: UBS Maintains Neutral Rating on International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (IFF), PT $83
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (NYSE:IFF) is one of the best wide moat stocks to buy now. On June 9, UBS analyst Joshua Spector reiterated a Neutral rating on IFF, with a consistent target price of $83. The analyst’s evaluation refers to the company’s latest Pharma divestment, which has successfully lowered its net debt-to-EBITDA ratio […]
